text: 13:5 Dɨboboniba 6:1-5; 1 Samuel 1:11Nɨ navim aseghɨva otarim bategham. Egh an dapanir arɨzim gisan markɨ. A nɨn navimɨn aven itima, God ua bagha a ginaba. Eghtɨ nɨ a bateghtɨ, a wainba ko dɨpar onganibar aman markɨ, egh uaghan God daman gumazibar anogoroghezir dagheba, a dar aman markɨ. Eghtɨ a ua Filistiaba da Israelia iniam.”
